name: J-Stars Victory Vs+
summary: Your favorite Shonen Jump heroes jump off the page and duke it out on your screen in J-Stars Victory VS, a 2v2 brawler that features an insane roster filled with manga & anime stars. J-Stars Victory Vs+ invites fans and gamers to play with their favorite manga/anime characters and progress in the JUMP World through different environments recalling Naruto, Dragon Ball Z, One Piece and other memorable moments for every manga and anime fan.

esrb.synopsis: This is a fighting game in which players compete in a battle tournament with fictional characters from a Manga series. Players punch, kick, and use special attacks (e.g., fireball, lightning strikes, laser blasts) to drain opponents' life meters in melee-style combat. Characters can perform super attacks in which characters are pounded into the ground, attacked by fiery blasts, and repeatedly slashed with swords. Battles are accompanied by colorful light effects, cries of pain, and large explosions. The game contains some suggestive material: female characters wearing outfits that expose large amounts of cleavage; dialogue that contains suggestive references (e.g., “I don't see any reason for delaying the unveiling of my finely honed physique,” “I'm not embarrassed to show a little skin,” and “In that case, I'll try to feel ashamed as I walk around naked”). During the course of the game, one character is shown emitting flatulence to perform a jump move; another character is shown poking a pink coil (resembling feces) with a stick. The word “a*s” appears in the game.
